de.affect.manage.event

Class AffectInputEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • de.affect.manage.event.AffectInputEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AffectInputEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    The AffectUpdateEvent class represents an event triggered by an update event of the affect information of all characters.
    Author:
    Patrick Gebhard
